game.name: SEARCH ALL - CRABS
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the crabs in a large location. Crabs will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the crabs in a large location. Crabs will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

reviewHighlights.text: Laid back and chill hidden object game, not very hard and has easy achievements.
This will be my copy-paste-post review of every Lausch Studio's "Search All whatevers" game: wait for a sale. Not as good in game mechanics or as pret...
